feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:33 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 08:56 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
